void TerrainBlock2::cacheCurrentLighting ( bool  addSpecular = true  )  [virtual]

This function stores the current ambient, directional, and (optionally) specular lighting state so this block can defer rendering correctly.

Parameters:
cacheSpecular Cache specular lighting, defaults to true.

Implements Terrain::BaseRenderTerrainBlock.

void TerrainBlock2::evaluate ( const Vector3 &  relativeCameraPos  )  [virtual]

This function manages resources dependencies for the block.

It calculates visibility settings, which are later used to stream or discard resources as appropriate. The actual streaming occurs in the stream() function.

Parameters:
relativeCameraPos The camera position relative to the block

const CombinedLayer * TerrainBlock2::layer ( uint32  index  )  const [protected]

bool TerrainBlock2::load ( std::string const &  filename,
Matrix const &  worldTransform,
Vector3 const &  cameraPosition,
std::string *  error = NULL 
) [virtual]

This function loads an BaseTerrainBlock from a DataSection.

Parameters:
filename A file to load the terrain block from.
worldPosition The position that the terrain will placed.
cameraPosition The position of the camera (to work out LoD level).
error If not null and there was an error loading the terrain then this will be set to a description of the problem.
Returns:
True if the load was completely successful, false if a problem occurred.

bool TerrainBlock2::preDraw ( bool  useCachedLighting,
bool  doSubstitution 
)

This function prepares the terrain block for drawing.

Parameters:
usedCachedLighting Use stored light state if true, or renderer current light state otherwise.
doSubstitution Substitute a missing vertex lod for best available.
Returns:
true, if the block was successfully set up.
